benchmark_details.name: LLMSecCode
benchmark_details.overview: LLMSecCode is an open-source evaluation framework designed to assess the secure coding capabilities of large language models in the context of code generation and automated program repair.
benchmark_details.data_type: code generation tasks and security-oriented assessments

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a framework for evaluating LLM capabilities in secure coding, automated program repair, and code generation.

data.source: Includes datasets for evaluating code generation and automated program repair capabilities.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on unit tests passing for generated code outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher pass rates indicate better model performance in generating secure and effective code.
methodology.validation: Results compared with external validated benchmarks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Ensures responsible use of AI models, including evaluation in closed environments.
